data.title: 'The Grand Tour (Adam Matthew - a Sage Company)' - A digital research collection of primary and secondary sources on the cultural history of the European Grand Tour
data.text:
TY - ADVS

T1 - 'The Grand Tour (Adam Matthew - a Sage Company)' - A digital research collection of primary and secondary sources on the cultural history of the European Grand Tour

A2 - Chaney, Edward

PY - 2009

Y1 - 2009

N2 - The Grand Tour; editors Jeremy Black, Edward Chaney and Rosemary Sweet. Digitized data-base of primary and secondary sources on the cultural history of the European Grand Tour. Includes:• Diaries and journals• Account books• Printed guidebooks• Published travel writing• Paintings and sketches• Architectural drawings• MapsIncludes searchable scans of hundreds of books and manuscripts selected from my personal library, currently housed in two locations in Southampton Solent University and available to research students and for undergraduate dissertations; two major essays; one bibliographical survey: ‘Grand Tour scholarship since 1900: a Personal Account’; the other, longer essay: ‘Travel as Education and the Origins of the Grand Tour’; Adam Matthew Digital. 2009.

AB - The Grand Tour; editors Jeremy Black, Edward Chaney and Rosemary Sweet. Digitized data-base of primary and secondary sources on the cultural history of the European Grand Tour. Includes:• Diaries and journals• Account books• Printed guidebooks• Published travel writing• Paintings and sketches• Architectural drawings• MapsIncludes searchable scans of hundreds of books and manuscripts selected from my personal library, currently housed in two locations in Southampton Solent University and available to research students and for undergraduate dissertations; two major essays; one bibliographical survey: ‘Grand Tour scholarship since 1900: a Personal Account’; the other, longer essay: ‘Travel as Education and the Origins of the Grand Tour’; Adam Matthew Digital. 2009.

M3 - Digital or Visual Products

ER -
